item.title: main-main
item.description:
TalalAlrawajfeh/mathematics-roadmap: A Comprehensive Roadmap to Mathematics (github.com)
资源检索技巧：（英文）

抽取书名中具有代表性的一个单词
抽取某个作者的名（注：一般作者的姓会省略或缩写）
常见问题：

原版的英文书名可能会被翻译成的中文通常不太恰当（注：可以通过豆瓣来得到该书被翻译后的中文书名）
很多时候 pdf 不是越大越好，大的 pdf 可能是一堆图片，而小的 pdf 更可能是一些纯文本和图片的组合
notes/solutions 都表示习题答案
标题的冒号:后面通常与版本号无关

Library Genesis (libgen.is)

基础 => Naive Set Theory, Mathematical Reasoning, Proofs, and Discrete Mathematics, Mathematical Logic and Model Theory, Axiomatic Set Theory
纯代数 => Abstract Algebra, Advanced Abstract Algebra, Universal Algebra
纯分析：

Real Analysis, Functional Analysis
the Theory of Computation
纯几何 => Euclidean and Non-Euclidean Geometry
代数+分析：
Discrete Mathematics
Game Theory
Number Theory, Algebraic Number Theory
代数+几何：
Linear Algebra, Advanced Linear Algebra, Motivation for Category Theory, Category Theory
Combinatorics
Lattice Theory
Algebraic Geometry Motivation, Algebraic Geometry
分析+几何：
Differential Equations, Partial Differential Equations
Complex Analysis
- Differential Geometry, Advanced Differential Geometry
- Optimization Theory, Convex Optimization
代数+分析+几何：
precalculus, calculus
Probability Theory, Mathematical Statistics, Advanced Probability Theory, Advanced Mathematical Statistics
Numercial Analysis
General Topology
Algebraic Topology Motivation, Algebraic Topology
Mathematical Analysis, Advanced Mathematical Analysis

哲学：

Philosophy, Logic, the Philosophy of Language, the Philosophy of Mathematics and Logic
Philosophy of Probability and Statistics
Problem Solving
Statistics
物理 => Physics
python => docs-hard/数学/refs/optional/Python
